message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the problem of automated detection of non-relevant posts on web forums, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses the use of word embeddings and their impact on the performance of the classifier, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper proposes a dataset of semantic relatedness with posts from a web forum, which could be relevant to the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CY (Computers and Society).
